about_the_game:
World League Baseball is a baseball game that anyone can pick up and play easily.
Rendered in a brand-new casual art style, it also has a character growth system with a high degree of freedom.

[Features]
● A full-on baseball experience with simple and easy controls!
"World League Baseball" is a baseball game with very easy-to-learn controls that lets anyone throw a fastball or hit a home run with ease.

● Build up a "World League" team to win the league!
Excel in each division to receive a huge sum of prize money. Recruit skilled players and continue to build up your team to ultimately become league champions!

● Play against players from around the world in a real-time "Online Match"!
The "Online Match" is a multiplayer mode that is season-based. Play games in real time and win to earn Game Points and raise your tier. The higher the tier, the greater the reward!

● Train a specific player through a "Private Lesson".
Choose a player to train from one of your nine key players. Control the chosen player directly and get stellar results for a chance to acquire more EXP and rewards.

● A character growth system with a high degree of freedom.
Collect player EXP and cards to raise a player's level and acquire various skills by leveling up. Each player's skill could be customized to match your strategy and style.

● Brand-new concepts to enjoy.
Play ball with over 300 unique players from 12 teams in stadiums built with unique concepts in mind, such as a giant stone statue, a temple, a dragon, and more.
